description:
Aggressive and successful, The Law Offices of Roger P Foley PA handles criminal defense cases for people in Fort Lauderdale and across the state of Florida. We are a client-focused practice where we make every accommodation to give the people, we represent peace of mind. For example, we provide the following:

• Free initial consultation
• 24/7 availability to respond to concerns
• Both in-person and virtual appointments
• Two locations

Understandably, being charged with a crime is stressful. Mr. Foley has more than 15 years of experience guiding people through difficult moments and crucial decisions. He helps clients weigh their options in a way that sets them up for the best possible path forward. This approach has led to favorable outcomes in matters such as drunk driving, drug crimes, sex offenses, murder, assault and domestic violence, among other charges. Mr. Foley also adeptly handles probation violations, sealed records and expungements.

Countless people have found a better future through working with our law offices. For outstanding service and proven results, Mr. Foley has received recognition that includes being listed in The National Trial Lawyers: Top 100; holding an Avvo "Superb" rating; being named a Super Lawyer; and being named in Florida Trend Magazine's Legal Elite.

As a matter of convenience, The Law Offices of Roger P Foley PA accepts credit cards.
